channel.title: Shop Help
channel.description:
EDIT: Fixed forgot to space out shop name and number correctly. Mod please delete
I just added a new shop, I've added wanneshop in client.java, NPC id in auto spawn.cfg, and made the shop in shops.cfg but i'm getting an error that i've never gotten before when I've made shops...
[code] IcyScape Server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 7 Wilderness_Accessories" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:80) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:126)[/code] What do I need to do?

item.title: Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @_Sublime `Sublime
item.description:
@_Sublime wrote:

EDIT: Fixed forgot to space out shop name and number correctly.
Mod please delete

I just added a new shop, I’ve added wanneshop in client.java, NPC id in auto spawn.cfg, and made the shop in shops.cfg but i’m getting an error that i’ve never gotten before when I’ve made shops…
